titan_pylib.data_structures.union_find.undoable_union_find のソースコード

 1from typing import List, Tuple
 2from collections import defaultdict
 3


[ドキュメント]
 4class UndoableUnionFind():
 5
 6  def __init__(self, n: int):
 7    self._n: int = n
 8    self._parents: List[int] = [-1] * n
 9    self._history: List[Tuple[int, int]] = []
10


[ドキュメント]
11  def root(self, x: int) -> int:
12    while self._parents[x] >= 0:
13      x = self._parents[x]
14    return x


15


[ドキュメント]
16  def unite(self, x: int, y: int) -> bool:
17    x = self.root(x)
18    y = self.root(y)
19    if x == y:
20      self._history.append((-1, -1))
21      return False
22    if self._parents[x] > self._parents[y]:
23      x, y = y, x
24    self._history.append((x, self._parents[x]))
25    self._history.append((y, self._parents[y]))
26    self._parents[x] += self._parents[y]
27    self._parents[y] = x
28    return True


29


[ドキュメント]
30  def undo(self) -> None:
31    assert self._history, f'Error: {self.__class__.__name__}.undo() with non history.'
32    y, py = self._history.pop()
33    if y == -1:
34      return
35    x, px = self._history.pop()
36    self._parents[y] = py
37    self._parents[x] = px


38


[ドキュメント]
39  def size(self, x: int) -> int:
40    return -self._parents[self.root(x)]


41


[ドキュメント]
42  def same(self, x: int, y: int) -> bool:
43    return self.root(x) == self.root(y)


44


[ドキュメント]
45  def all_roots(self) -> List[int]:
46    return [i for i, x in enumerate(self._parents) if x < 0]


47


[ドキュメント]
48  def all_group_members(self) -> defaultdict:
49    group_members = defaultdict(list)
50    for member in range(self._n):
51      group_members[self.root(member)].append(member)
52    return group_members


53


[ドキュメント]
54  def clear(self) -> None:
55    for i in range(self._n):
56      self._parents[i] = -1


57
58  def __str__(self) -> str:
59    return f'<{self.__class__.__name__}> [\n' + '\n'.join(f'  {k}: {v}' for k, v in self.all_group_members().items()) + '\n]'


60
